articles.title: Rwanda starts vaccine trials against deadly Marburg virus - BBC.com
articles.description: The health ministry says there are at least 46 cases in the east African country.
articles.content:
Rwanda has said it will begin vaccine trials for the fatal Marburg virus, which has already killed at least 12 people in the country - most of them health workers.
